item.title: Educational Assessment: Formal Education Shelved
item.description:
Summary: Considered accounting/study; identified language/time costs as gates. Pivoted to immediate job search + targeted certs.

Source: Raw Transcripts: Batch 2

Decision

Formal education path shelved due to language barriers and time costs. Pivot to:

  • Immediate job search
  • Targeted certifications (LinkedIn Learning, etc.)
